workshoptitle: Integrate Oracle Data Safe with Applications and Services

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides information about the Oracle Data Safe workshop.

tutorials.title: Get started
tutorials.description: Get an Oracle Cloud account if needed and sign in.

tutorials.title: Prepare your environment
tutorials.description: Prerequisites to run the Oracle Data Safe workshop in your own tenancy.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Register Autonomous AI Database with Oracle Data Safe
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to register Autonomous AI Database with Oracle Data Safe and load sample data into it.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Download the latest security assessment by using the Oracle Data Safe CLI
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to use the Oracle Data Safe CLI to download a security assessment report.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Copy audit data to object storage using the Oracle Data Safe REST API
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to use the Oracle Data Safe REST API to copy audit data to object storage.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Schedule the copying of audit data to object storage using the Oracle Data Safe REST API
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to use the Oracle Data Safe REST API to schedule the copying of audit data to object storage.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Get notified about security drift on your target databases by setting up notifications in Oracle Data Safe
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to set up notifications in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
